problem.title: The Problem
problem.subtitle: Why small online shops need AI automation
problem.intro: Small and medium online shops face growing challenges: customers expect fast 24/7 support, accounting consumes valuable time, and personnel costs keep rising. Meanwhile, they lack the resources of large corporations.

support.title: 24/7 Customer Service
support.description: Customers expect instant answers — even at 11 PM. Small shops can't afford a round-the-clock support team. Dissatisfied customers switch to competitors.

accounting.title: Manual Accounting
accounting.description: Writing invoices, booking payments, sending reminders — all of this costs hours per week and is error-prone. Small shops don't have a dedicated accountant.

scaling.title: Growth Without Extra Costs
scaling.description: More orders mean more support requests and more accounting work. Staff doesn't scale linearly — AI does.

problem.conclusion: ShopControl AI solves exactly these problems: A fully autonomous AI agent handles customer service while accounting runs automatically in the background.

solution.title: The Solution
solution.subtitle: Two AI pillars for the modern online shop
solution.intro: ShopControl AI combines two powerful automation systems in one solution: an intelligent support agent and fully automatic accounting.

support.title: AI Support Agent
support.description: A fully autonomous chatbot that instantly answers customer inquiries about orders, products, and returns — with access to real-time shop data via Shopify.

features.f3: Shopify integration for order status & products
features.f4: Escalation to human support when needed

accounting.title: Automatic Accounting
accounting.description: Invoices are automatically created, sent via email, and logged in Google Sheets — completely without manual intervention.
